wikipedia_page.main: Duncan James Macrae (4 November 1914 – 15 May 2007) was a player for the Scotland national rugby union team playing 9 games at centre between 1937 and 1939., as well as for the British Isles team

response: *Duncan Macrae (rugby union) (1914–2007) Scottish rugby union player
Duncan Macrae or Duncan MacRae may refer to:
* Duncan Macrae (rugby union) (1914–2007), Scottish rugby union footballer
